column2: Formulate an ontology related to interest. Provide it in valid Turtle/RDF format, excluding any extra text.
column3: ```turtle@prefix : <http://example.org/ontology/interest#> .@prefix rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> .@prefix rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> .:Interest rdf:type rdfs:Class .:FinancialInterest rdf:type rdfs:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf :Interest .:PersonalInterest rdf:type rdfs:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf :Interest .:hasInterestIn rdf:type rdf:Property ;    rdfs:domain :Person ;    rdfs:range :Interest .:InterestRate rdf:type rdf:Property ;    rdfs:domain :FinancialInterest ;    rdfs:range rdfs:Literal .:CompoundInterest rdf:type rdfs:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf :FinancialInterest .:SimpleInterest rdf:type rdfs:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf :FinancialInterest .:Hobby rdf:type rdf:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf :PersonalInterest .:Person rdf:type rdfs:Class .# Example Instances:Reading rdf:type :Hobby ;    rdfs:label "Reading"@en .:JohnDoe rdf:type :Person ;    :hasInterestIn :Reading .:SavingAccount rdf:type :CompoundInterest ;    :InterestRate "3.5"^^xsd:decimal .```

column2: Construct an ontology focused on the following: interest. Provide it in valid Turtle/RDF format, excluding any extra text.
column3: ```turtle@prefix : <http://example.org/ontology/interest#> .@prefix rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> .@prefix rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> .@prefix owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> .@prefix xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> .:Interest rdf:type owl:Class ;          rdfs:label "Interest" ;          rdfs:comment "A liking or preference towards something or someone." .:Person rdf:type owl:Class ;        rdfs:label "Person" ;        rdfs:comment "An individual human being." .:Topic rdf:type owl:Class ;        rdfs:label "Topic" ;        rdfs:comment "A subject or area of interest." .:hasInterest rdf:type owl:ObjectProperty ;             rdfs:domain :Person ;             rdfs:range :Topic ;             rdfs:label "has interest" ;             rdfs:comment "Indicates a person's interest in a specific topic." .:InterestLevel rdf:type owl:Class ;               rdfs:label "Interest Level" ;               rdfs:comment "The degree of interest someone has in a particular topic." .:lowInterest rdf:type :InterestLevel ;             rdfs:label "Low Interest" ;             rdfs:comment "Indicates a low level of interest." .:mediumInterest rdf:type :InterestLevel ;                rdfs:label "Medium Interest" ;                rdfs:comment "Indicates a moderate level of interest." .:highInterest rdf:type :InterestLevel ;              rdfs:label "High Interest" ;              rdfs:comment "Indicates a high level of interest." .:interestStrength rdf:type owl:DatatypeProperty ;                  rdfs:domain :Interest ;                  rdfs:range xsd:integer ;                  rdfs:label "interest strength" ;                  rdfs:comment "Numeric representation of the strength of interest." .:isExpressedBy rdf:type owl:ObjectProperty ;               rdfs:domain :Interest ;               rdfs:range :Person ;               rdfs:label "is expressed by" ;               rdfs:comment "Associates an interest with the person who expresses it." .:isAbout rdf:type owl:ObjectProperty ;        rdfs:domain :Interest ;        rdfs:range :Topic ;        rdfs:label "is about" ;        rdfs:comment "Connects interest to the topic it is about." .```

column2: Design an ontology to encompass the following: interest.   Provide it in valid Turtle/RDF format, excluding any extra text.
column3: ```turtle@prefix : <http://example.org/interest#> .@prefix rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> .@prefix rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> .@prefix xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> .:Interest rdf:type rdfs:Class ;    rdfs:label "Interest" ;    rdfs:comment "A class representing the concept of interest." .:PersonalInterest rdf:type rdfs:Class ;    rdfs:label "Personal Interest" ;    rdfs:subClassOf :Interest ;    rdfs:comment "Interests related to individual hobbies or passions." .:FinancialInterest rdf:type rdfs:Class ;    rdfs:label "Financial Interest" ;    rdfs:subClassOf :Interest ;    rdfs:comment "Interests in the context of economic or financial gain." .:Hobby rdf:type rdfs:Class ;    rdfs:label "Hobby" ;    rdfs:subClassOf :PersonalInterest ;    rdfs:comment "An activity done regularly in leisure time for pleasure." .:Investment rdf:type rdfs:Class ;    rdfs:label "Investment" ;    rdfs:subClassOf :FinancialInterest ;    rdfs:comment "The action or process of investing money for profit." .:hasInterest rdf:type rdf:Property ;    rdfs:label "has interest" ;    rdfs:domain :Person ;    rdfs:range :Interest ;    rdfs:comment "Relates a person to their interest." .:isInterestedIn rdf:type rdf:Property ;    rdfs:label "is interested in" ;    rdfs:domain :Person ;    rdfs:range :Interest ;    rdfs:comment "Indicates that a person has a particular interest." .:Person rdf:type rdfs:Class ;    rdfs:label "Person" ;    rdfs:comment "A class representing a human being, who may have various interests." .```
